Reason: The 'concurrent_validations' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the number of repair validations that can occur simultaneously, leading to potential resource contention and performance degradation if set too high. The code adjusts the pool size for validations based on this configuration, which involves time-extensive operations to manage the parallelism of repair validations. This can result in notable performance variations at the system level, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
